Posts.Content: I am a BC patient experiencing a recurrence. Jan. 25, 2001 first diagnosed with treatment for left breast. Jan. 31, 2005 underwent "Simply Mastectomy" now I have 2 chemo treatments under my belt with 4 more to go. Chemo is the worst and I thought the last time was bad! Whew! I don't know anything about what you are dealing with. When I read your message my heart dropped and I had to ask HIM to BLESS you both. Sincerely
Posts.Title: Parkinson's and Breast Cancer
